title: Out
description: ASIN B074CQ9554 moved to the most recent edition hereCamryn Thomas finds her life turned upside down. A betrayal she never envisaged happening brings a new beginning that will change her life forever. Taking a chance, she moves from her hometown of London to the glitzy world of Los Angeles. She lives by one rule - do not fall in love.Things go great and life is finally falling into place until she meets the one person who could be worth breaking her rule for. But, what if that person isn't OUT and this relationship could ruin her career?Is it worth the risk?
author: Claire Highton-Stevenson
